section.p: Gills grow out of your neck as soon as you have read the runes aloud! You make your way down a track to the beach, and swim out to sea. The gills work perfectly, and you find yourself swimming in the eerie silence of a submarine world.

Suddenly, a hideous form looms out of the murk. It is rather like a giant squid, but it carries a spear in one of its many tentacles and wears rudimentary armour. Great black eyes shine with an implacable alien intelligence.
